summary: Since its Peter's birthday today, just imagine Tony surprising him by picking him up from school and Peter is just so elated...
body: Since its Peter’s birthday today, just imagine Tony surprising him by picking him up from school and Peter is just so elated that he’s blushing and Tony says they can do whatever Peter wants to do today and Pete gets all sheepish and confesses “actually Mr. Stark, I would really like to help you out in your lab today, if that’s okay with you” and Tony’s heart just fucking BURSTS with fondness and thinks how did he get so lucky to have such a good kid?

summary: Across the Aisle - Chapter 15 - The State Dinner
title: Across the Aisle - Chapter 15 - The State Dinner
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Washington DC
December 2012

Tony stares at Rumiko Fujikawa as she emerges from the St. Regis, the hundreds of thousands of beads of her long-sleeved powder blue sheath gown gleaming brilliantly under DC’s winter moonlight. Her smile is coy, and she walks towards Tony with an elegance that money and class cannot buy—it simply radiates from within her. He remembers how this grace made it easy for him to fall in love with her, how natural it was to just simply be with her. And with her standing in front of him looking as radiant as ever, it would not be so hard to fall back into that feeling again. But they had their time, and all their cards had run out all those years ago. Now an unspoken fondness and mutual respect remain, their strong and steady friendship weathering the years that have passed since they both decided that being romantically involved was no longer in their best interests.

“Darling, I do hope that’s not real fur. You of all people know how much rap I would get from the environmental lobby if it were,” Tony teases, referring to the white minx stole wrapped around Rumiko’s shoulders, protecting her from the cold.

Rumiko laughs heartily as she kisses him on the cheek. “It’s faux fur. Very expensive faux fur, to be exact. But don’t worry, Tony, I’ll be sure to mention how fake it is to the reporters.”

“I trust you know how the game is played.” Tony opens the car door for her and they both slide in. “But you do look stunning, Ru,” he compliments her as they settle in the limousine. She only smiles.

Washington DC
December 2012

Tony stares at Rumiko Fujikawa as she emerges from the St. Regis, the hundreds of thousands of beads of her long-sleeved powder blue sheath gown gleaming brilliantly under DC’s winter moonlight. Her smile is coy, and she walks towards Tony with an elegance that money and class cannot buy—it simply radiates from within her. He remembers how this grace made it easy for him to fall in love with her, how natural it was to just simply be with her. And with her standing in front of him looking as radiant as ever, it would not be so hard to fall back into that feeling again. But they had their time, and all their cards had run out all those years ago. Now an unspoken fondness and mutual respect remain, their strong and steady friendship weathering the years that have passed since they both decided that being romantically involved was no longer in their best interests.

“Darling, I do hope that’s not real fur. You of all people know how much rap I would get from the environmental lobby if it were,” Tony teases, referring to the white minx stole wrapped around Rumiko’s shoulders, protecting her from the cold.

Rumiko laughs heartily as she kisses him on the cheek. “It’s faux fur. Very expensive faux fur, to be exact. But don’t worry, Tony, I’ll be sure to mention how fake it is to the reporters.”

“I trust you know how the game is played.” Tony opens the car door for her and they both slide in. “But you do look stunning, Ru,” he compliments her as they settle in the limousine. She only smiles.

tags: he doesn't always think his way is the right way
summary: After making that Harley gifset, I am just struck by how much Tony Stark listens to others and asks for input. Tony: "They’re...
body:
After making that Harley gifset, I am just struck by how much Tony Stark listens to others and asks for input.

Tony: “They’re coming in hot, any second. What’s the play?”

Rhodey: “Well, we want to take the high ground, okay? So let’s put the biggest gun up on that ridge.”

Tony: “Got you.”

Tony: “Call it, Cap.”

Steve: “Alright, listen up. Until we can close that portal up there, we’re gonna use containment. Barton, I want you on that roof, eyes on everything. Call out patterns and strays. Stark, you got the perimeter. Anything gets more than three blocks out, you turn it back or you turn it to ash.”

Harley: “Anyways, I would have added in um… the retro…”

Tony: “Retro-reflective panels?”

Harley: “To make him stealth mode.”

Tony: “You want a stealth mode?”

Harley: “Cool, right?”

Tony: “That’s actually a good idea. Maybe I’ll build one.”

Maria Hill: “Lab’s all set up, boss.”

Tony: [pointing to Steve] “Uh, actually, he’s the boss. I just pay for everything, and design everything and make everyone look cooler.”

Tony: “Okay, anybody on our side hiding any shocking and fantastic abilities they’d like to disclose, I’m open to suggestion.”

Tony: “Come on. We got a situation. See him down there? He’s in trouble. What’s your plan? Go.”

Peter Parker: “Um… Okay, okay… Uh… Okay. Did you ever see this really old movie, Aliens?”

… but of course he always thinks he’s right, right? And he never listens? He’s all ego.

summary: I'm rewatching Infinity War right now, and when Tony says "Probably Steve Rogers." I never noticed Stephen in the background...
body: I’m rewatching Infinity War right now, and when Tony says “Probably Steve Rogers.” I never noticed Stephen in the background saying “Oh great.” Like he saw all the CW stuff in the news, he realizes that they aren’t on speaking terms. I never realized this and I wanted to share

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Purgatory
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2MacdTQ

by Jonah_Smith_907

After Midland Circle, the crash-side is searched for survivors. To everybody’s surprise, they find Daredevil with a woman laying just next to him.

Or: Matt is really badly hurt (both physically and emotionally) and needs his friends more than ever. Also his identity got kinda revealed so Jessica is kind enough to get Tony Stark on the phone.

It’s basically a shitload of hurt and a hell of a lot of comfort. Like … really angsty and really fluffy comfort.

Words: 1016, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Daredevil (TV), The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, The Defenders (Marvel TV)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Characters: Matt Murdock, Franklin “Foggy” Nelson, Karen Page, Colleen Wing, Danny Rand, Luke Cage, Claire Temple, Tony Stark, Peter Parker, probably - Character, idk where this is going - Character
  • Relationships: Matt Murdock/Elektra Natchios, Matt Murdock & Franklin “Foggy” Nelson, Matt Murdock & Karen Page, Matt Murdock & Claire Temple, Matt Murdock & Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Hurt/Comfort, Emotional Hurt/Comfort, Angst, Fluff, Fluff and Angst, Angst and Hurt/Comfort, there’s just a lot of hurt okay, Matt is very very hurt, idk i just started writing this, i’ll update the tags as i go along

blog.name: tonystarkficrecs
blog.title: Tony Stark Fic Recs
blog.description: Simply put, I love fics revolving around Tony Stark. Star ratings are my opinion only! If you liked a fic, make sure you leave them kudos/comments! Rec requests are currently closed.

summary: tear me to pieces, skin to bone by withered ★ ★ ★ Words: 1,157 Pairing: Gen Completed: Yes Humans are very prone to emotion and...
body:
tear me to pieces, skin to bone by withered

★ ★ ★

Words: 1,157

Pairing: Gen

Completed: Yes

Humans are very prone to emotion and are harder for it. Wanting to hide it away – wanting to pretend they’re infallible to it. Mantis thinks its either brave or stupid. Emotions, after all, are meant to be felt.

Based off a tumblr ask that begged the question, “What would Mantis feel if she touched Tony?”

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Forcing another Ending.
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2B24P7S

by danyul_31

Tony felt bile rising up his throat. His hands began to shake, pain shooting through his left arm. He bit down on his tongue, grunting in pain as his breath became more erratic. ‘I dont wanna go Mr. Stark, please’ and 'I’m sorry’, Peter’s words still lingered in the air, suffocating him.

Words: 1418, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Iron Man (Movies), Captain America (Movies), Black Panther (2018)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Bruce Banner, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Thor (Marvel), James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Okoye (Marvel), Shuri (Marvel), T'Challa (Marvel), Nebula (Marvel), Sam Wilson (Marvel), Wanda Maximoff, Vision (Marvel), James “Bucky” Barnes, Peter Parker, Stephen Strange
  • Relationships: Shuri & T'Challa (Marvel), Tony Stark & Avengers Team
  • Additional Tags: focuses on the aftermath of the snap, Angst, not sure what else, meeting up after civil war for the first time, Panic Attacks, Self-Loathing, no one believed tony whoops


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2B24P7S

blog.name: ironmess
blog.title: au where tony is happy
blog.description: hi im moffatt aka your local bi argie that loves tony stark. i am first and foremost, marvel's bitch

summary: What do u think tony would be happiest for his child to study.. do u think he’d want them to stay away from engineering and...
question: What do u think tony would be happiest for his child to study.. do u think he’d want them to stay away from engineering and business and want them to be into like art or history??
answer: tony would be the number one fan of every stupid thing his child does… like if she went for art he’d have her paintings all over his house and would tell every guest the greatest artist in the world did them… if she wanted to build robots he would 100% teach her and then let her imagination flow and let her build what ever the fuck her heart desires. tony stark would be happy to just see their child happy
